title: IVR Applications
description:
IVR Applications


IVR Applications is the menu that allows configuring IVR applications. Examples of IVR applications are Calling Card, ANI Callback, Top-up etc. Once created, the application can be assigned to one or more DID numbers which are referenced each time a call via a specific DID number is received.

For applications that provide language selection there is list of languages to select from. Once the application has been saved there is also a section to fine-tune the application parameters. A detailed description of advanced parameters is provided in the IVR Section.


Availability


Sippy Softswitch 4.0
